subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|y=ko|か|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}
* Some dictionaries apparently classify this reading as either ''{{ll|ja|呉音|goon}}'' or ''{{ll|ja|慣用音|kan'yōon}}''.

subSections.title: Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|華を去り実に就く|か を さり じつ に つく}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|火事と喧嘩は江戸の華|かじ と けんか は ^えど の はな}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|枯木 華 開く|こぼく はな ひらく}}
